tasks.title: Analyze Elementor JavaScript Codebase Structure
tasks.description: Deep analysis of Elementor's original JavaScript codebase to map file structure, module organization, and API patterns
tasks.details: Research the original Elementor plugin structure in core/assets/dev-js/, core/app/, and related directories. Document current vs target file organization, identify missing modules, and create detailed mapping between existing types and original implementations.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate mapping against actual Elementor plugin files and ensure comprehensive coverage of all modules

tasks.title: Create Common/Core Module Foundation
tasks.description: Restructure common utilities, base classes, and configuration interfaces to match Elementor's core structure
tasks.details: Create src/common/ directory with utils/, helpers/, and config/ subdirectories. Implement device detection utilities, DOM manipulation helpers, environment detection, global configuration interfaces, and shared type guards that mirror Elementor's common utilities.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate utilities match original Elementor implementations and provide comprehensive type coverage

tasks.title: Restructure Frontend Handler System
tasks.description: Align frontend handlers with original Elementor structure and implement element-specific handlers
tasks.details: Reorganize src/frontend/handlers/ to match Elementor's handler structure. Implement base handler classes and element-specific handlers (Button, Heading, Image, Video, etc.) with proper inheritance, lifecycle methods, event binding, and settings processing that mirrors the original implementations.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate handler hierarchy and methods match original Elementor frontend handlers

tasks.title: Restructure Editor Control System
tasks.description: Comprehensively restructure the editor control system to match original Elementor control architecture
tasks.details: Reorganize src/editor/controls/ to mirror Elementor's control structure. Implement base control classes (BaseControl, BaseData, BaseMultiple, BaseUnits), all control types (Color, Typography, Dimensions, Media, etc.), control registration and factory system, control views and behaviors, and validation systems that match the original implementations exactly.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate all control types and their inheritance hierarchy match original Elementor editor controls

subtasks.title: Create base control classes
subtasks.description: Implement base control classes: BaseControl, BaseData, BaseMultiple, BaseUnits
subtasks.details: Create src/editor/controls/base/, base-data/, base-multiple/, base-units/ matching the original Elementor control base classes with proper inheritance and lifecycle methods

subtasks.title: Implement simple control types
subtasks.description: Create simple control types: Hidden, Button, Notice, Tab, Section
subtasks.details: Implement controls that don't require complex data handling: hidden.ts, button.ts, notice.ts, tab.ts, section.ts

subtasks.title: Implement input control types
subtasks.description: Create input control types: Number, Select, Select2, Switcher, Choose, Code, Wysiwyg
subtasks.details: Implement text input and selection controls with proper value handling and validation

subtasks.title: Implement visual control types
subtasks.description: Create visual control types: Color, Icon, Icons, Media, Gallery, ImageDimensions
subtasks.details: Implement controls for visual elements including color pickers, icon selectors, media library integration, and gallery management

subtasks.title: Implement layout control types
subtasks.description: Create layout control types: Dimensions, Slider, Gaps, BoxShadow, Structure
subtasks.details: Implement controls for layout management including dimensions with units, slider ranges, spacing gaps, box shadow configuration, and structural layout options

subtasks.title: Implement advanced control types
subtasks.description: Create advanced control types: Repeater, RepeaterRow, PopoverToggle, DateTime, Font, URL, WPWidget, VisualChoice
subtasks.details: Implement complex controls including repeater fields with dynamic rows, popover toggles, date/time pickers, font selection, URL inputs with link options, WordPress widget integration, and visual choice selectors

tasks.title: Restructure Editor Element System
tasks.description: Align editor element system with original Elementor element architecture
tasks.details: Reorganize src/editor/elements/ to match Elementor's element structure. Implement base element classes, element types (Widget, Section, Column, Container), element models and collections, element views and rendering system, settings processing and inheritance that mirrors the original element system architecture.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate element hierarchy, models, and views match original Elementor element system

subtasks.title: Create element base classes
subtasks.description: Implement element base classes and manager
subtasks.details: Create src/editor/elements/manager.ts and base element classes including ElementBase, Widget, Section, Column with proper model/view/collection patterns

subtasks.title: Implement element models
subtasks.description: Create element model classes with data binding
subtasks.details: Implement BaseElementModel, WidgetModel, SectionModel, ColumnModel with Backbone.Model inheritance, settings management, and change tracking

subtasks.title: Implement element views
subtasks.description: Create element view classes with rendering and event handling
subtasks.details: Implement BaseElementView, WidgetView, SectionView, ColumnView with Marionette.View patterns, template rendering, and DOM event management

subtasks.title: Create element collections
subtasks.description: Implement element collection classes
subtasks.details: Create ElementsCollection, WidgetsCollection, SectionsCollection with Backbone.Collection patterns for managing multiple elements

tasks.title: Create Editor Document System [CRITICAL - 40+ files]
tasks.description: Implement the complete /editor/document/ system including commands, hooks, elements, dynamic tags, history, save operations, and UI management - highest priority gap
tasks.details: Create src/editor/document/ mirroring the original 40+ files structure. Implement document commands for CRUD operations, comprehensive hook system for data and UI events, element management within documents, history stack with undo/redo, auto-save and manual save systems, and document UI state management.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate document system matches original Elementor document management functionality

subtasks.title: Document Command System
subtasks.description: Implement document commands including create, delete, save, and element manipulation commands
subtasks.details: Create src/editor/document/commands/ with all command types from original: elements/commands, dynamic/commands, globals/commands, history/commands, save/commands, and their internal variants

subtasks.title: Document Hook System
subtasks.description: Create data and UI hooks for document operations, including before/after hooks for all operations
subtasks.details: Implement src/editor/document/hooks/ with data/document/elements hooks and ui/create, ui/delete, ui/settings hooks matching the original structure

subtasks.title: Document Element Management
subtasks.description: Implement document-level element management including creation, deletion, move, and paste operations
subtasks.details: Create src/editor/document/elements/ with element commands, element hooks, and element management that matches original document/elements structure

subtasks.title: Document History System
subtasks.description: Create history stack, undo/redo operations, and state management for document changes
subtasks.details: Implement src/editor/document/history/ with history commands (base, internal), history management, and state tracking matching original history system

subtasks.title: Document Save System
subtasks.description: Implement auto-save, manual save, revision management, and save behaviors
subtasks.details: Create src/editor/document/save/ with save behaviors, commands (base, internal), and UI hooks for save operations matching original save system

subtasks.title: Document UI & Other Systems
subtasks.description: Create document UI states, repeater system, globals, dynamic tags, and command bases
subtasks.details: Implement remaining document systems: ui/, ui-states/, repeater/, globals/, dynamic/, command-bases/ matching original structure

tasks.title: Create Editor Components System [CRITICAL - 100+ files]
tasks.description: Implement the complete /editor/components/ system including browser-import, documents, template-library, settings, preview, selection - second highest priority gap
tasks.details: Create src/editor/components/ mirroring the original 100+ files structure. Implement browser import with file parsers, document management components, complete template library system, settings components, preview system, selection system, and all other UI components.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate components system matches original Elementor editor components functionality

subtasks.title: Browser Import System
subtasks.description: Implement file import system with parsers for JSON, images, videos, and file readers
subtasks.details: Create src/editor/components/browser-import/ with commands, commands-internal, files/parsers (base, image, json, video), files/readers, and items matching original structure

subtasks.title: Document Components
subtasks.description: Create document management components including commands, hooks, and models
subtasks.details: Implement src/editor/components/documents/ with commands, commands/internal, hooks/ui (attach-preview, close, open, switch), and models matching original structure

subtasks.title: Template Library System
subtasks.description: Implement complete template library with behaviors, collections, commands, and views
subtasks.details: Create src/editor/components/template-library/ with behaviors, collections, commands, commands-data, event-manager, models, and comprehensive views system including parts/folders, parts/header-parts, template views

subtasks.title: Settings Components
subtasks.description: Create settings base, editor preferences, and page settings systems
subtasks.details: Implement src/editor/components/settings/ with base settings, editor-preferences, and page settings matching original settings component structure

subtasks.title: Preview System
subtasks.description: Implement preview management and preview-related commands
subtasks.details: Create src/editor/components/preview/ with preview commands and preview management system matching original preview functionality

subtasks.title: Selection & Other Components
subtasks.description: Create selection system, dynamic tags, hotkeys, icons manager, and validator components
subtasks.details: Implement remaining components: selection/, dynamic-tags/, hotkeys/, icons-manager/ (classes, components), and validator/ matching original structure

tasks.title: Create Data/Globals System [HIGH - 20+ files]
tasks.description: Implement the complete /editor/data/globals/ system including colors, typography, and global state management - third priority gap
tasks.details: Create src/editor/data/globals/ mirroring the original 20+ files structure. Implement base global system, global colors with commands, global typography with commands, and global data commands for managing site-wide design tokens.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate data/globals system matches original Elementor global design system

subtasks.title: Globals Base System
subtasks.description: Implement base global system architecture and global value management
subtasks.details: Create src/editor/data/globals/base/ with base global classes and global value management system matching original structure

subtasks.title: Global Colors System
subtasks.description: Create global colors management including color commands and color value handling
subtasks.details: Implement src/editor/data/globals/colors/ with color commands and global color value management matching original global colors functionality

subtasks.title: Global Typography System
subtasks.description: Implement global typography management including typography commands and font handling
subtasks.details: Create src/editor/data/globals/typography/ with typography commands and global typography management matching original typography system

subtasks.title: Global Commands System
subtasks.description: Create global data commands for managing and synchronizing global values
subtasks.details: Implement src/editor/data/globals/commands/ with data commands for global value synchronization and management matching original structure

tasks.title: Complete Container Model System [HIGH]
tasks.description: Complete the container system by implementing the missing /editor/container/model/ system
tasks.details: Add the missing src/editor/container/model/ directory to complete container system. Implement container model classes and container-specific data handling that was identified as incomplete in the coverage analysis.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate container model system matches original Elementor container model functionality

subtasks.title: Container Model Classes
subtasks.description: Implement container model classes and container-specific data handling
subtasks.details: Create src/editor/container/model/ with container model classes matching original /editor/container/model/ structure

subtasks.title: Container State Management
subtasks.description: Create container state management and container lifecycle methods
subtasks.details: Implement container state management, lifecycle methods, and container-specific functionality matching original container system

tasks.title: Create Regions System [HIGH]
tasks.description: Implement the complete /editor/regions/ system including navigator, panel, responsive-bar - significant missing functionality
tasks.details: Create src/editor/regions/ mirroring the original 30+ files structure. Implement navigator with commands, panel system with pages (editor, elements, menu), responsive bar, and region management that controls editor layout and interaction.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate regions system matches original Elementor editor region management

subtasks.title: Navigator Region
subtasks.description: Implement navigator with commands for structure tree management
subtasks.details: Create src/editor/regions/navigator/ with navigator commands and structure tree functionality matching original navigator region

subtasks.title: Panel Region System
subtasks.description: Create panel system with commands and internal commands
subtasks.details: Implement src/editor/regions/panel/ with panel commands, commands/internal, and panel management matching original panel region system

subtasks.title: Panel Pages System
subtasks.description: Implement panel pages including editor, elements, and menu pages
subtasks.details: Create src/editor/regions/panel/pages/ with editor/ (commands), elements/ (collections, models, views), and menu/ (views) matching original panel pages

subtasks.title: Responsive Bar Region
subtasks.description: Create responsive bar for device preview switching
subtasks.details: Implement src/editor/regions/responsive-bar/ with responsive controls matching original responsive bar functionality

tasks.title: Create Advanced Frontend Systems [MEDIUM]
tasks.description: Implement missing frontend systems including tools, video API, lightbox, and advanced utilities
tasks.details: Enhance src/frontend/ with missing tools, video API loaders, lightbox system, and advanced utilities. Add frontend/tools/, frontend/utils/video-api/, frontend/utils/lightbox/, and other missing frontend functionality.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate frontend systems match original Elementor frontend tools and utilities

subtasks.title: Frontend Tools
subtasks.description: Implement frontend tools including stretch-element and other utility tools
subtasks.details: Create src/frontend/tools/ with stretch-element and other frontend utility tools matching original tools functionality

subtasks.title: Video API System
subtasks.description: Create video API loaders for YouTube, Vimeo, and base video handling
subtasks.details: Implement src/frontend/utils/video-api/ with base-loader, youtube-loader, vimeo-loader matching original video API functionality

subtasks.title: Lightbox System
subtasks.description: Implement lightbox manager and lightbox functionality with screenfull support
subtasks.details: Create src/frontend/utils/lightbox/ with lightbox-manager, lightbox, screenfull matching original lightbox system

subtasks.title: Advanced Frontend Utils
subtasks.description: Create advanced utilities including URL actions, anchors, flex scroll, and assets loader
subtasks.details: Implement remaining frontend utils: url-actions, anchors, flex-horizontal-scroll, assets-loader, anchor-scroll-margin matching original structure

tasks.title: Create Module System [MEDIUM]
tasks.description: Implement the complete /modules/ system including import utilities and module management
tasks.details: Create src/modules/ mirroring the original /modules/ directory structure. Implement module import utilities and module management system that handles Elementor's modular architecture.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate module system matches original Elementor module management functionality

subtasks.title: Module Import System
subtasks.description: Implement module import utilities and import management
subtasks.details: Create src/modules/imports/ with import utilities matching original modules/imports/ functionality

subtasks.title: Module Utilities
subtasks.description: Create module utility functions and helper systems
subtasks.details: Implement src/modules/imports/utils/ with module utility functions matching original structure

tasks.title: Update Main Index and Namespace Exports
tasks.description: Restructure main index.ts and namespace organization to match new architecture
tasks.details: Update src/index.ts to properly export from the new module structure. Ensure namespace organization mirrors Elementor's module organization. Maintain backward compatibility with existing exports while providing clean new structure. Update all import/export relationships to match the original codebase dependencies.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate all exports work correctly and maintain backward compatibility

tasks.title: Cross-Reference and Validation
tasks.description: Comprehensive cross-referencing of all types with original Elementor implementations
tasks.details: Validate all module dependencies and imports match original codebase. Ensure comprehensive coverage of all public APIs. Cross-reference every interface and class with actual Elementor JavaScript implementations. Verify 99% API coverage and structural alignment with original codebase.
tasks.testStrategy: Comprehensive testing against actual Elementor plugin files and API validation

subtasks.title: API Coverage Audit
subtasks.description: Verify all public APIs are properly typed and documented
subtasks.details: Systematically audit all Elementor public APIs, check interface completeness, verify method signatures, validate property types, and ensure comprehensive coverage of all exposed functionality

subtasks.title: Dependency Validation
subtasks.description: Check all import/export relationships and module dependencies
subtasks.details: Validate all TypeScript imports/exports, verify module dependency chains, check circular dependencies, ensure proper namespace organization, and confirm module resolution works correctly

subtasks.title: Original Code Comparison
subtasks.description: Cross-reference with actual Elementor JavaScript files
subtasks.details: Compare TypeScript interfaces against original Elementor JavaScript source code, verify class structures match, check method implementations, and ensure 1:1 correspondence with the actual codebase

subtasks.title: Missing Types Identification
subtasks.description: Find and document any gaps in type coverage
subtasks.details: Identify missing interfaces, incomplete type definitions, undocumented APIs, edge cases not covered, and create comprehensive gap analysis with prioritized recommendations for completion

subtasks.title: Documentation Update
subtasks.description: Update inline docs and usage examples
subtasks.details: Enhance JSDoc comments, create comprehensive usage examples, update README with new structure, document breaking changes, and provide migration guides for the updated type system

tasks.title: Final Integration and Compatibility Testing
tasks.description: Final integration testing and backward compatibility validation
tasks.details: Comprehensive TypeScript compilation testing, consumer testing with existing projects using the types, integration testing with actual Elementor JavaScript code, performance testing to verify no impact from type changes, and final validation of zero breaking changes for existing consumers.
tasks.testStrategy: Full regression testing and compatibility validation with existing type consumers

subtasks.title: TypeScript Compilation
subtasks.description: Full build and type checking validation
subtasks.details: Run comprehensive TypeScript compilation tests, verify declaration generation, check strict mode compliance, validate module resolution, and ensure clean builds across all configurations

subtasks.title: Consumer Testing
subtasks.description: Test with projects using the types
subtasks.details: Test integration with real projects, verify IntelliSense functionality, check autocomplete accuracy, validate import patterns, and ensure seamless developer experience with the updated types

subtasks.title: Breaking Change Analysis
subtasks.description: Verify backward compatibility and identify breaking changes
subtasks.details: Analyze API changes, identify breaking modifications, create compatibility matrices, document migration paths, and ensure minimal disruption for existing consumers of the type library

subtasks.title: Performance Testing
subtasks.description: Check build time and IntelliSense performance
subtasks.details: Measure TypeScript compilation time, test IntelliSense response times, profile memory usage, benchmark type checking performance, and optimize any performance bottlenecks found

subtasks.title: Release Preparation
subtasks.description: Version bump, changelog, and documentation preparation
subtasks.details: Update package version, create comprehensive changelog, prepare release notes, update README with new features, create migration guide, and prepare for npm publication

tasks.description: Align editor UI components with original Elementor component structure - replaced by Components System (Task 13)

tasks.title: Create Command Bases System
tasks.description: Implement base command classes and interfaces for the editor command system
tasks.details: Create base command infrastructure including CommandBase, CommandData, CommandDataBase, CommandContainerBase, CommandContainerInternalBase, CommandHistoryBase, CommandInternalBase, and Delete command base. These form the foundation of the editor's command pattern implementation.

tasks.title: Enhanced Control Registration System
tasks.description: Improve control registration typing based on real project usage patterns
tasks.details: Research shows window.elementor.addControlView(name, view) is heavily used in real projects (ArtsFluidDesignSystem, etc.). Need to add proper typing for control registration methods, enhance window.elementor.modules.controls access patterns, and improve extend() method typing for custom control creation.

tasks.title: Breakpoints API Enhancement
tasks.description: Enhance breakpoints interface with real usage methods
tasks.details: Real usage shows window.elementor.breakpoints.getActiveBreakpointsList({largeToSmall: true, withDesktop: true}) pattern. Need to add proper typing for breakpoints API methods, responsive design helpers, and device management functions used in production code.

tasks.title: AJAX System Enhancement
tasks.description: Improve AJAX interface with real usage patterns
tasks.details: Research shows window.elementor.ajax.addRequest(action, options) is critical for data operations. Need to enhance AJAX interface typing, add proper request/response types, improve success/error callback typing, and add real usage patterns found in production projects.

tasks.title: Frontend Hooks Enhancement
tasks.description: Enhance hooks system with real integration patterns
tasks.details: Real usage shows window.elementorFrontend.hooks.addAction() and elementsHandler.attachHandler() patterns. Need to enhance frontend hooks typing, improve action/filter registration, add proper handler attachment typing, and support real integration scenarios.

tasks.title: Complete Frontend Handlers System
tasks.description: Complete all missing frontend handlers for 99% coverage (17 files)
tasks.details: Implement missing frontend handlers including background-video, background-slideshow, container handlers, section handlers, widget handlers, and accessibility handlers. Current coverage: 11/28 files (39%). Need to add 17 more files to achieve complete frontend handler coverage matching original Elementor JS structure.

subtasks.details: Complete background video and slideshow handlers for section/container background functionality

tasks.title: File-by-File Accuracy Verification
tasks.description: Verify each TypeScript file matches corresponding JavaScript file exactly
tasks.details: Compare each .ts file against corresponding .js file for method signatures, property types, and API accuracy. Ensure 100% consistency between TypeScript definitions and original Elementor JavaScript implementations for ultimate accuracy.

metadata.description: RESTRUCTURED FOR 99% COVERAGE: Added 7 critical new tasks (12-18) based on coverage analysis. Priority order: Document System (40+ files), Components System (100+ files), Data/Globals (20+ files), Container Model completion, Regions System (30+ files). Deferred admin/app tasks to focus on core editor systems. Current coverage estimate: ~35%  target 99%.
Master branch tasks for Elementor Types project - restructured for 99% coverage goal
